Description:
This hotel enjoys stunning views of San Marino and offers guests the privacy and quiet of natural surroundings, together with the magnificence of its fine grounds, where they can enjoy the beauty of a well-kept garden and the peace of a unique location. Guests will find the nearest bars 1 km away and it is 2 km to restaurants and shops and just 3 km to one of the world's loveliest little medieval towns. Rimini's historical centre with its Romanic ruins and famous beaches is only 15 km away.

This family-friendly hotel is ideal for business travellers and holidaymakers alike and comprises a total of 130 rooms, including 8 junior suites. Facilities on offer to guests at this air-conditioned establishment include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception and check-out service, a hotel safe, lift access, a newspaper stand and a TV lounge. There is a cafe, and the Il Giglio restaurant is open every day for lunch and dinner. Moreover, staff are always ready to respond attentively to visitors' needs. Guests will appreciate the 6 meeting rooms. They can also take advantage of the laundry service and there is parking available for those arriving by car.

All rooms are spacious, well-lit, simple and elegant, and enjoy splendid views. All come with a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. They are equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, Internet access and a minibar. Furthermore, individually regulated air conditioning and heating are provided in all accommodation as standard.

Golf enthusiasts can play a round at the nearby course in Verucchio (18 km).

The quality of dining available to guests is expressed in the value placed on serving tasty, well-balanced, fresh cuisine which is sure to satisfy guests' requirements. Meals are served in a range of locations throughout the hotel, including the large restaurant and the comfortable, welcoming breakfast room, where every morning a mouthwatering American buffet awaits guests.

Each unit at the Residence San Marino comes with digital TV channels and air conditioning. A DVD player and a stereo are also included.

A coin-operated laundry machine is available at the residence. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note the service charge is not applicable to meal plan costs, and is not applicable to business guests who have a VAT number and require an invoice.

Guests are kindly requested to inform the residence in advance of their estimated time of arrival. This can be noted in the Comments Box during booking or by contacting the residence using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

When travelling with pets, please note that an extra charge of EUR 10 per pet, per night applies. A maximum of 2 pets are allowed.

Description:
Located 4 km from San Marino city centre, Hotel Gasperoni offers rooms with free WiFi and free parking space. Public transport is 50 metres from the property, linking to Rimini and San Marino.

Featuring air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, rooms have a wardrobe and a private bathroom equipped with bath or shower and hairdryer. Some rooms have a sea-view balcony.

Rimini is a 20-minute drive from Hotel Gasperoni, while the historic cities of Ravenna and Urbino are both within 80 km of the property.

Description:
Situated in San Marino, 16 km from Rimini Stadium and 18 km from Rimini Train Station, B&B Maison Il Melograno features accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a garden.

The bed and breakfast offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and bidet. Some units also have a kitchen equipped with a fridge, a dishwasher, and an oven.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, Italian or vegetarian options.

A barbecue can be found at B&B Maison Il Melograno, along with a shared lounge.

Fiabilandia is 18 km from the accommodation, while Rimini Fiera is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Federico Fellini International Airport, 18 km from B&B Maison Il Melograno.
